posts.post_title: FS: Hank Aaron + 1950 Yankees team 1947-66 Exhibits
posts.post_content:
1947-66 Exhibits for Hank Aaron and 1950s Yankees

The auction house I purchased these from said the Aaron was "Ex-Mt-Plus" and the '50 Yankees was "VG-EX"

Both cards have discoloration/dark spots/areas.

[url]https://flic.kr/s/aHBqjzJcMA[/url]

$45 for the Aaron, $15 for the Yankees.
$55 for both

PP FF or add 3% for G+S

Thanks for looking

1950 Yankees have sold.

I am moving the Aaron thread to the 1920-49 area where Exhibits belong.
